runs.comm: full, leg-side, clipped to long leg by Trott
Great ball, back of a length and seams away, Trott taps it to the off side
Ooh, and again, this one moves away and Razzaq has Trott feeling for it and missing outside off. Ball doesn't carry through to the keeper though
full and straight, Trott clips it firmly to midwicket, but well-fielded there
Razzaq keeping it very tight here, in the channel on off stump on a good length, and the ball's not really coming on to the bat here
full again, and well-placed by Trott past the midwicket fielder, and he picks up a couple more
On the hips, nicely timed by Denly and he's off the mark straight away.
Denly solid in defence as Arafat pitches it up. There is a little movement for the bowlers out there
just outside off, nips back a little off the seam but left alone by Denly. England's openers in no rush here
Same ball, but he plays at it this time. hits the inside half of the bat and trickles to mid one
driven firmly by Denly, but straight at the cover fielder
straighter again, and well played by Denly through midwicket, the deep square leg runs round and keeps it to two
pitched back of a length and that seams sharply in to Trott, who plays it a little awkwardly.
Trott gets on top of this one, nurdling it to midwicket but the tumbling fielder cuts it off, no run there
and again, sharp movement in to the batsman, Trott plays across the line to midwicket but can't connect and the ball thuds into his pads
outside off this time, goes straight on and Trott plays the ball watchfully into the covers. Not timing it too well, is Trott
half-volley on leg stump and that's firmly clipped through midwicket, and the batsmen run England's fifth two of the innings!
full again, but that's a good line, Trott leans on the ball and pushes to midwicket, but straight to the fielder
good bowling, full and seaming away and Denly drives airily outside off stump. Lucky not to get an edge on that one, although it may not have carried anyway
Denly plays this much more watchfully, and the batsmen steal a single to mid on
shorter, and Trott half-pulls this to the sweeper at midwicket. The bowlers have been very straight to Trott, who keeps moving across his stumps
Denly charges down the track and has a massive heave, but his head's in the air and he missed the ball by miles
Gone! Arafat strikes! Another failure for Denly, ball nips back in through a massive gap between bat and pad and the stumps are rattled
Pietersen moves right across his stumps and tries to hit to leg, big seam movement and that's four wides down the leg side!
Pietersen walks down the track and mistimes a short-arm jab to mid on. He's showing intent, obviously keen to get going straight away
hit straight to mid-on, and it's the red bull run! Very tight single there, fielder has a go but misses, that would've been a close call
Trott plays the ball defensively into the covers and they steal another sharp single
straight to mid-off, but the fielder fumbles it and they get another single. Bad misfield by Shoaib Malik there
shorter, and slightly wide outside off, but Trott just hangs his bat out lazily to play the ball down to third man
down the track, great shot from Pietersen to just his fourth delivery. Uses his feet to great effect and bunts that over a wide mid-on for a boundary
walks down again and flicked aggressively down to fine leg
that's Trott's best shot, drifting onto leg stump and flicked away past short fine-leg and it beats deep square to the rope
opens the face and runs this down to third man
ooh, that was close, short ball which seams back into Pietersen but he angles it away between the two short third-man fielders with precision...skill or luck? A bit of both
extravagant flick off his legs, goes in the air for a long time but falls just short of deep square-leg running away and it nearly dribbles to the boundary
outside off, pushed square to backward point
moves across his crease and flicks away to deep square-leg
good line on off stump, Trott wants to use his feet but in the end just defends into the covers
pushed square into the off side, can't find the gap
once again the ball doesn't really come on as Trott glides this backward of point
another powerful flick off his legs, another fumble in the field as well, this time at midwicket
thick inside edge as he tries to drive, dribbles towards square leg...Trott certainly not finding it was easy as Pietersen
huge swing and a miss, outside off and Pietersen tries to heave it through the leg side down on one knee but only connects with fresh air
full on off stump, driven firmly into the covers
in the block hole, worked down to long on
tossed up a little more, Pietersen drives strongly but just for a single down the ground
angled out to backward point
googly this time, cramps Trott for room and he can't find a gap in the off side
driven into the off side, tight start from Mr A
nearly strikes first ball, Pietersen backs away and gets a bottom edge as he tries to drive and it scoots past leg stump down to fine leg
played with the spin through midwicket

boy, what a shot that was, steps down the track and launches this into the top tier of the stand with an effortless straight drive and takes out a spectator in the process...elegance and power from KP, he's getting it back
opens the face and dabs into the off side
expansive drive, but doesn't make contact against a quicker ball
fired in on middle and leg, tries to whip into the leg side but only takes the pad
cut away hard but straight to backward point...Pietersen itching to cut loose
another crackerjack from Pietersen, stands and deliveries as he drills this in the air through mid off with the power to beat the deep fielder
quicker ball on the stumps, Pietersen just jabs down on it in time

well, what happened there? Pietersen wasn't even looking as Afridi bowled and just swings his bat at it, getting a bit top edge that loops over short third man...that was extraordinary, what would KP have said if he'd been out?
inside edge into the leg side
driven down the ground and that's the half way mark.
clipped to midwicket
down the track, and an easy push down the ground
Trott using his feet as well here, and good running
wristy push from Pietersen, hit back towards the bowler
down the pitch again, this one goes on with the arm and played defensively
finally Trott finds some timing, fuller delivery and slog-swept with good power to the midwicket boundary
down the track, extraordinary shot, he's hit a low full toss straight back over Afridi's head
Pietersen sits back in the crease now, flaying this through the off side off the back foot
and that one spun back in, Trott didn't seem to pick it, played awkwardly
oh, an attempted reverse-sweep , but he can't connect
hit uppishly but into the gap on the leg side for a couple
full, Trott plays this into the covers but straight at the fielder and there's no run there
starts with a short, wide ball which Pietersen throws absolutely everything at, but he's missed the ball by miles
good length, Pietersen gets on top of it and drops the ball to the off side, and they scamper a single
wide again, Trott times it well but Alam at point makes a good diving stop, he's definitely saved runs there
this one nips back in sharply to take the inside edge, and that almost squeezed through to hit the stumps. There's definitely still something for the bowlers in this pitch
dropped! Pietersen comes down the track and absolutely hammers the ball straight at Afridi, who puts down a tough chance. He looks to be in some pain too.
and another misfield allows a single
tossed up, reverse sweep but can't connect
hammered through the off side, Pietersen wants two and they make it through
wristily flicked through leg, and that's Pietersen's fifty. Stylish innings, and timely too
flighted again, hit straight back at the bowler
Pietersen has a go at this one, doesn't middle it but the ball rolls down to long on and Pietersen keeps the strike
nicely bowled, good pace and Pietersen can't do much with that one
massive hit! Pietersen backs away and lofts the ball way, way over long off. That ball has gone straight into one of the sponsor's boxes. Huge.
gives himself room again, and can't connect, but that's a free hit as Gul over-stepped there. What can Pietersen do with it?
full, wide yorker, well bowled
full again, Trott pushes the ball down to mid on
gives himself a bit of room, the ball is pitched up and he hammers that through the covers. In the air but timed well, important boundary for Trott
back of a length, cut into the off side but can't find the gap
worked down to long on
leading edge as he tries to work to leg, the ball loops into space on the off side
excellent quicker yorker, Pietersen squeezes it out but only to the keeper
whipped with a turn of the wrists into the leg side
poor line, down the leg side and swept around the corner...deep square-leg does well to cut off the boundary
goes down on his knee and sweeps out to deep square...keeps the strike which Pakistan won't mind
heaves into the leg side but it just dribbles away...Trott doesn't want the single, but Pietersen charges up the pitch and Trott is sacrificed which is the right thing for England
width outside off stump, swings away further and Pietersen gets the toe end as he drives out to deep cover
full outside off, driven firmly to cover and a valuable dot ball
angled away neatly down to third man to get off the mark
way wide outside off, that would nearly have been too wide in Test cricket
excellent yorker, Pietersen was very deep in his crease and jabs it into the leg side
there he goes, on leg stump and Morgan effortlessly picks this up over deep square-leg for a handsome six...was just a flick from Morgan, but he packs such a punch
goes for a sweep and is struck on the back leg, the umpire is quick to raise his finger and that ends a fine innings from Pietersen...well, replays suggest that may have gone down leg side
starts with a doosra, Wright is square up and gets a leading edge into the off side
low full toss on leg stump, chipped just over midwicket
comes in with the arm, cramps Morgan for room and he can only get a single to backward point
down the track, drives and gets a thick outside edge to short third man
full outside off, driven firmly into the offside and straight at cover...a direct hit from Afridi brings the third umpire into action but Wright is comfortably home
fire outside off and it's given wide much to the annoyance of bowler and keeper
another one goes, Morgan tries to loft straight down the ground but instead it goes straight up in the air and long off gets round comfortably
leg stump yorker, swung away through the side
what a way to start, down the pitch and swings a back-of-a-length delivery over long leg for six...that's how to do it
uses his feet again and crunches a drive down to long on
gives himself room and only just manages to reach this, gets a thick edge down to third man where there's a fumble which allows a second run
goodbye, don't bother looking for that, was on a good length and Wright picked it up early, swinging mightily over deep midwicket for the second six of the over...that was a sweet strike
full toss outside off, hammered to cover who is on the edge of the circle
wide full toss, Wright almost swings himself off his feet and clears short third man for another brace
another one goes miles in the air, but not with the required distance and Afridi steadies himself under the catch...importantly for Pakistan it's a dot ball, the wicket is a bonus
low full toss hammered straight down to long off where Imran Nazir takes a good catch...late wickets boosting Pakistan
ooh, that was nearly it as Collingwood swings hard through the leg side and the ball falls just short of deep square-leg running around, but only manages to kick it away
well bowled, excellent yorker and all Prior can do is jab it into the off side for a final-ball single
